_header: Shall I by whom all thing began
_description: James Ryman song, thirteen cross-rhymed quatrains with first repeated after each of the remaining twelve as if a burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
Shalle I by whome alle thing beganneDere moder shalle I
                    sooShal I dye for synfull manneAnd suffre payne and wooMy dere
                    sonne thou diddest nevir mysWherefor shuldest thou so
                    doo…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …Wherin with me ay thou shalt rayneWhere nevir shalle be woo
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 231-3.
